name: TBI Translations
tag_list: english-to-french-translator, translate-website, translation-service, translation-agency, human-translation, native-french-translators, english-document-translations, professional-translator, proofreading, editing, software-localization, translation-compa
overview:
TBI Translations is specialized in French/English translations. Since 1997, we have been helping individuals and businesses to communicate effectively, grow their business internationally, and give them a competitive edge on the global market. Our projects range from small to large, from general to technical subjects, and encompass many types of documents.

Our professional translators are subject-qualified and native speakers of the target language to produce translations that are correct and accurate in substance, language, style, and cultural nuance. In addition, our quality management system ensures that you receive the highest quality translation within the set deadline.

With many years of experiences, we are able to manage any projects requiring consistence in terminology, layout, and content. As a member of the American Translators Association, we strictly adhere to the Code of Professional Conduct and Business Practices to protect our clients best interests.
